resources.string: Balance your professional and personal life with multiple Spaces.
What you can do with a Work Space:

string-array.name: space_features
string-array.item: Keep your work apps and accounts separate from your personal apps and accounts.
Switch between Spaces using different PINs.
Information is encrypted in each Space.
Let IT manage your Work Space and nothing else.
Protect work data from malware and viruses.

resources.string: Tap the icon to switch between your personal and work Space.
Please select the Enterprise Mobility Management tool used by your company. If you do not know which EMM to select please contact your technical administrator or skip if you do not use an EMM.
